Posts.EditableText:
How do i turn .quest or .aslx file to html?

please help im desperate
Posts.HTML:
How do i turn .quest or .aslx file to html?

please help im desperate

Posts.EditableText:
You probably can't.

There's a few people working on something like that, but it's quite a big project. Basically boils down to rewriting all of Quest in Javascript. You could try using QuestJS, but there's still a lot of features that don't work properly.
